categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Nathan Donar III was a Human male Imperial Stormtrooper who served in the Imperial Military during the Galactic Civil War.

He was a Human male with small brown eyes and a long, thin nose. He graduated from the same class at the Academy of Carida that Kyle Katarn was in; during the graduation ceremony, he was given the position of Cadet Company Commander. He tried to warn Katarn to stay away from Jan Ors onboard the Star of Empire, but Katarn betrayed Nathan's trust, warning Ors about her imminent capture. He was subsequently killed as A-Cee self destructed.
He was the youngest son of Governor Dol Donar II and Rissa Donar.
In the audio adaptation of Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire, he was voiced by Patrick Coyle.
